content.text: Match ends, Blackpool 2, Manchester City 3.
Second Half ends, Blackpool 2, Manchester City 3.
Goal!  Blackpool 2, Manchester City 3. Gary Taylor-Fletcher (Blackpool) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luke Varney following a corner.
Attempt missed. Luke Varney (Blackpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Charlie Adam following a corner.
Corner,  Blackpool. Conceded by Joleon Lescott.
David Silva (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Blackpool 1, Manchester City 3. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by James Milner following a set piece situation.
Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Charlie Adam (Blackpool).
Foul by Gary Taylor-Fletcher (Blackpool).
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked. Assisted by James Milner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by David Vaughan.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ian Evatt.
Attempt blocked. Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by David Silva with a through ball.
Substitution, Manchester City. Patrick Vieira replaces Adam Johnson.
Foul by Marlon Harewood (Blackpool).
Micah Richards (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by David Silva.
Offside, Manchester City. Joe Hart tries a through ball, but Carlos Tévez is caught offside.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
